validations.password: Password must have at least 8 characters
validations.field-min-length: the field must have at least 3 characters
validations.field-max-length: the field must have at most 50 characters
validations.cep: CEP must be in the format 00000-000
validations.hour: The hour must be in the format 00:00
validations.latitude: Latitude must be less than or equal to 90 and greater than or equal to -90 and have decimal precision 1 digit at least (e.g. 12.3)
validations.longitude: Longitude must be less than or equal to 180 and greater than or equal to -180 and have decimal precision 1 digit at least (e.g. 12.3)

forgot-password.enter-your-email: Enter your email address that we will send you a recovery email.

confirmation-modal.title: Recovery Email Sent
confirmation-modal.message: We have sent you an email to reset your password. Check your inbox!

home.choose-category: Choose the category you want to discard:
home.see-closest-places: See places closest to your location!
home.if-you-have-questions: If you have any questions, visit our FAQ!

questions.how-to-separate: How to separate waste for recycling?
questions.i-have-became-a-collector: I've became a collector. How to add a place?
questions.how-many-places: How many places can I add?
questions.where-is-the-comment-section: Where is the comments section about places present in the mobile application?

answers.how-to-separate: Place separate bins for different types of waste in a convenient location in your home and Make sure everyone in your household understands the importance of recycling.
answers.i-have-became-a-collector: Go to account page and click on "Become a collector" button. Then you will be able to add a place.
answers.how-many-places: You can add as many places as you want. We encourage you to add as many places as you can!
answers.where-is-the-comment-section: The comments about places is not present in the desktop application.

account.you-have-no-places: You have no places added yet.

add-place.you-can-search: You can get the latitude and longitude searching for the place address in google maps.
